tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE console_game_mapping (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    console_id INT,
    game_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (console_id) REFERENCES console_settings (console_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES game_settings (game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE game_settings (
    game_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    console_id INT,
    difficulty VARCHAR(50),
    starting_level INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (console_id) REFERENCES console_settings(console_id)
);

CREATE TABLE player_settings (
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    control_scheme VARCHAR(50),
    language VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES game_settings(game_id)
);

CREATE TABLE leaderboard (
    leaderboard_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    player_id INT,
    score INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (game_id) REFERENCES game_settings(game_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (player_id) REFERENCES player_settings(player_id)
);
